name: Cerys The Cat
description:
Cerys The Cat

The game is finished but does have 3 playable levels.

(Hasn't been tested on Linux)

Controls

Move - Arrow keys / joystick
Jump - Control/ Gamepad A button
Dash Attack - Space bar / Gamepad B button
Pause - P key / Start

I hope someone can get a little enjoyment or inspiration from it.
I enjoyed making it, but was never 100% happy with it.

The graphics, 3D models and sound effects where all created by myself, the music is cc0 and downloaded.

Thanks!
